name: The Other (SeedHolt, PaperMartin, RavenSkin01, vallhakin)
description:
You're new in this school. And on this planet too.

You are the Other in the eyes of the others.
But despite everything, you are like them.
It's too bad they may not realize it yet.

Have fun in class.

Arrows to move around, Mouse and left click to interact with and move items on the desk.

Code - Martin Wetischek
Code - Pierre Tahon
Narrative Design - Pierre Jeanne / Dr Holt
Graphs - Valentin Degroote
Cover Art - Marine Gambier
Light Awash by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/3978-light-awash License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
Orchard - Omori (Omocat)
Anxiety - Celeste (Extremely OK Games)
Normal. - Omori (Omocat)
White Pillars - Omori (Omocat)
You Must Carry On - Omori (Omocat)
